original_text: And on that day there shall be inscribed on the bells of the horses, “Holy to the Lord.” And the pots in the house of the Lord shall be as the bowls before the altar.
korean_text: 그 날에는 말 방울에까지 여호와께 성결이라 기록될 것이라 여호와의 전에 있는 모든 솥이 제단 앞 주발과 다름이 없을 것이니

sentences.original_text: there shall be inscribed on the bells of the horses
And the pots in the house of the Lord
shall be as the bowls before the altar.
